trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class uses classes derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> to get the discovery endpoint to use.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> utilizza le classi derivate da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> per ottenere l'endpoint di individuazione da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> class calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> method on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> instance passed by the user to get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> for discovering the services.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> chiama il metodo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> sull'istanza <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider> passata dall'utente per ottenere l'oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpoint> per l'individuazione dei servizi.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> also calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> method whenever it must clone itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryClientBindingElement> chiama anche il metodo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryEndpointProvider.GetDiscoveryEndpoint%2A> quando si deve duplicare.
